env_remarks: Also: water potential measured in non-transpiring leaves at midday. All water potentials were measured in some trees (pn398,pn399,pn269,pn395,qf400,qf393,qf394,qf297,qi397,qi396) one time in June and August of 2011,2012 and 2013. Tree leaf areas were measured for the same trees and dates as water potential.
